title: Treasure gardens with Alan Titchmarsh
creator_credit: Treasure House Group and Tadpole Lane
brief_description: Gardening expert Alan Titchmarsh takes you on an armchair journey through the grounds and gardens of eight of England’s historic houses. Included on the journey are the Broadlands in Derbyshire, Palace in On Walk at Harewood House; Yorkshire, Castle Howard, the Beaulieu estate in Hampshire, Woburn Abbey in Bedfordshire and the Peacock and Rose Gardens at Warwick Castle. Rhododendrle]
